property.name: cluster_name
property.description: Use a descriptive name for your cluster

property.name: node_attr_rack
property.description: Add custom attributes to the node

property.name: path_data
property.description: Path to directory where to store the data (separate multiple locations by comma)

property.name: path_logs
property.description: Path to directory where to store the logs

property.name: network_host
property.description: Set the bind address to a specific IP (IPv4 or IPv6)

property.name: http_port
property.description: Set a custom port for HTTP

property.name: discovery_zen_ping_unicast_hosts
property.description: Pass an initial list of hosts to perform discovery when new node is started

property.name: discovery_zen_minimum_master_nodes
property.description: Prevent the "split brain" by configuring the majority of nodes (total number of nodes / 2 + 1)

property.name: gateway_recover_after_nodes
property.description: Block initial recovery after a full cluster restart until N nodes are started

property.name: node_max_local_storage_nodes
property.description: Disable starting multiple nodes on a single system

property.name: action_destructive_requires_name
property.description: Require explicit names when deleting indices
